items.partner: Practice Manager, Phillips and Leigh, 5 Pemberton Row, London EC4A 3BA

Member - United Grand Lodge of England and Guildhall Lodge
Member - Coleman Street and Farringdon Ward Clubs & President - Castle Baynard Ward Club
Court Member - Worshipful Companies of Coopers, Tax Advisors, Arts Scholars (Master 2014/2015)

gifts.gift: Acted as LMLT at the UN 70th anniversary commemoration at Guildhall, lecture , reception and dinner. Accompanied by my wife to the lecture and reception. Hospitality provided by the UNA
Wife attended Gibraltar Day at Guildhall. Hosted by HM government of Gibraltar. A reception.
Acted as LMLT at the British Exporters Association Lunch at Mansion House. Hospitality provided by the Association.
Attended the Presentation Dinner with wife, hosted by the Worshipful company of Shipwrights and the Worshipful company of Goldsmiths
Acted as LMLT at the Upholders Annual Banquet at Mansion House, Hospitality provided by the Company.
Presented with a cushion by the Worshipful company of Holders, embroidered with their Coat of Arms, and the details of their current Master.
LMLT at The Stationers' Company Civic Dinner, at Stationers' Hall, and was accompanied by my wife
LMLT at The Rifles Awards Dinner at Guildhall
LMLT at the Annual Dinner of the Worshipful Company of Pattenmakers at Mansion House. Presented with a China Plate with a brief history of the company painted thereon.

Guest of the Worshipful Company of Plaisterers at their Spring Dinner in role as Chairman of the Open Spaces and City Gardens Committee, to receive on behalf of the City, the payment of a silver crown as symbolic rent for the garden adjoining the Hall
Guest (with my wife) at the Worshipful Company of Grocers' Presentation Dinner at Grocers' Hall, at which I delivered a speech.
Attended, together with my wife, an early evening reception at the Turkish Embassy, to celebrate anniversary of the foundation of the Republic.
Together with my wife, I was invited to the Kuwait National Day Lunchtime Reception, which my wife attended. It was held at the Dorchester hotel W1.
Gresham College Stakeholder Presentation & Dinner (Worshipful Company of Mercers)
